<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unhampered Passage](/Feats.aspx?ID=1434) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You won't allow others to restrain you. You can cast [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) on yourself as a primal innate spell once per day.
name: Unhampered Passage
